titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (SPECIAL QUESTIONS QUESTION A) - Description

body.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (SPECIAL QUESTIONS QUESTION A) is the PERSON SCORE for question A of the Special Questions section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment .
The question asks "Is this child on the Child Protection Register, fostered or adopted?".
